definition: meager/slight/weak/ungenerous or unkind/frivolous/to despise/to belittle/to look down on/to approach or near
to catch sight of in a doorway (old)
board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious

sentences.english: The Hamiltonian solution system is generalized to the Reissner-Mindlin thick plate problems.
sentences.chinese: 将哈密顿求解体系推广应用于薄板弯曲问题。

sentences.english: Superimposing of parts forms a laminate which increases the rigidity and solidity of the panel.
sentences.chinese: 重叠的部分形成了一个薄板增加面板的硬度和坚固度。

sentences.english: At the same time, the convergence is proven for solving 4-order plate bending problem.
sentences.chinese: 证明了该单元对薄板弯曲问题的收敛性。

sentences.english: Finally, the elastic transformation using smooth thin- plate spline interpolation is performed.
sentences.chinese: 最后利用薄板样条播值函数完成弹性变换。

sentences.english: Flush mounted swing-handle, screwed into 2 holes for sheet metal and plastic enclosures.
sentences.chinese: 暗装的旋转把手，旋入金属薄板和塑料电箱的两孔里。

sentences.english: One part is made of a sheet of metal painted black.
sentences.chinese: 一个部分是一张被漆成黑色金属薄板。

sentences.english: The door was sheet metal welded on to the frame of iron.
sentences.chinese: 门是焊接在一个铁框上的金属薄板。

sentences.english: Applicable to the collection delivery of all kinds of rolls, either fine sheet metal nonmetallic material.
sentences.chinese: 适用于各种卷料之收放，薄板金属及非金属材料均可。

sentences.english: The heat stamping experiment proves the deep drawing property of AZ31 magnesium alloy thin sheet.
sentences.chinese: 交叉轧制的AZ31镁合金薄板具有良好的深冲性能。

sentences.english: Standard Specification for Aluminum Bronze Sheet, Strip, and Rolled Bar.
sentences.chinese: 铝青铜中厚板，薄板，带材和轧制棒材标准规格。

sentences.english: Applicable to the collection and delivery of all kinds of rolls, either fine sheet metal or nonmetallic material.
sentences.chinese: 适用于各种卷料之收放，薄板金属及非金属材料均可。

sentences.english: His study is divided from the living-room by a thin wooden partition.
sentences.chinese: 他的书房是用薄板从起居室分隔而成的。

sentences.english: The experiment model with simply-supported edges is created.
sentences.chinese: 创建了具有简支边界条件的薄板实验模型。

sentences.english: Alignment device arranges panel via 2 speeds not to cause bends on thin panels.
sentences.chinese: 具备二段式整板装置，拍薄板不会发生拱起现象。

sentences.english: Twin-roller casting process is an advanced technology to produce efficiently thin metal strip.
sentences.chinese: 双辊铸轧是一种高效制备金属薄板带坯的先进技术。

sentences.english: The Solution for plates with edges clamped is a rather difficult problem in the small-deflection theory of thin plates.
sentences.chinese: 在薄板的小挠度理论中，四边固定的矩形板是个难题。

definition: acetal resin/Delrin/unplasticized polyvinyl chloride (uPVC or rigid PVC)
